website_summaries.verdict: More positives than negatives make this an attractive choice, but similar or better options are available for less money.
pros: Commercial grade-mat stays in place and is easy to clean
Works well in the kitchen or office
Feels durable and has an attractive appearance
Comes in multiple colors and several sizes
cons: Is hard and offers little relief to joints and feet
Retains plastic manufacturing smell and creases
Profile is too high for some

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: I tried four other similar type anti fatigue mats in addition to these. One of the others fell apart at the seams after about 4 months of use. Two of the others flattened out over use of standing. This has been the only one to handle all the abuse I have put them through both at work and home. I purchased 7 of these now and still would like to get more.
customer_reviews.author: DSM

customer_reviews.title: Does not age well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat in November 2018. I liked it at first. But now, a year and a half later, it no longer stays in place and slides all over the floor. Also, the edges are curling up, causing me to trip over it all the time. This morning I tripped over it for the last time and threw it out, worried that I'd fall and hurt myself eventually. I'd warn you not to purchase it, but it looks like they're no longer being sold anyway. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyAdornsVirtue

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but the box was too big, Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great upgrade to the rug I had in front of my kitchen sink. Good quality and rapid delivery. My only complaint is for Amazon. The box was so large for this small mat that I could hardly get it into the back seat of my car. It was a complete waste of resources and I had to drop it off at UPS where the staff accommodated recycling it
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bernardi

customer_reviews.title: It's like walking on puffy little clouds....
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had these in her home and I spent Thanksgiving just hanging out on them, sipping tequila because I knew in my heart of hearts that I would not be injured when I passed out! Had to have a set for my house! I also bought a set for my BFF for Christmas as she is cheap and wouldn't spend the money on them for herself! Who knows who else I might purchase a set for???? The possibilities are endless. Great Job!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Surface flaked off
customer_reviews.text: After a year of light use the surface is flaking off, still has the firmness but the surface if coming off in tiny pieces and ends up all over the kitchen floor. Not happy at all, I'm sure there are reasonable anti fatigue mats out there similarly priced that will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: rickdonna

customer_reviews.title: Great mat, with not great durability
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these in Nov 2015 for our kitchen. We disposed of one last year because the top started to disintegrate (see bubbling and peeling, above). We are now tossing the second one out for the same reason. Served us well for a while, but expected them to last longer. We are in our 70s and not hard on our furnishings. Hope this helps future purchasers make a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Proceed to go

customer_reviews.title: Best mat ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had these mats in her kitchen and when visiting her, I decided we needed some. We have tile floors in the kitchen and after standing for several hours cooking or doing whatever my back and feet just ached. No more of that with these mats. They truly are wonderful. We love, not only, the comfort they provide, but also, they are easy to clean. The perimeter is slanted so you don't catch the tip of your shoe or toes on the edge and trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy (feet) days are here again!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the family chef & he loves the mats in the kitchen by the stove and sink areas where he spends lots of time cooking. We were both surprised that the color was so dark (brown) & because I'm a somewhat shallow person who puts great stock in appearance, would not recommend selecting this color. I'm thinking of stenciling them & wondered if you could suggest the appropriate type of paint that could endure in a heavily trafficked area? Otherwise, the mats were in good shape when they arrived and our cat, Morgan, thoroughly enjoyed playing in the empty box. So win -win!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is so comfortable and looks great in my kitchen. I can't believe the difference it makes on my feet when standing for awhile. There is a lifetime guarantee, and the company stands by that 100%. My first mat wore out after about 3 years of heavy use and they immediately sent me a brand new one. I would highly recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stolting

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd gotten one of these mats years ago. It's thick, supportive, easy to clean, and really helps with tired feet and back from standing at the sink for long periods of time. It's probably triple or more the thickness of the mats that I had in the past, and I love the density and comfort. Fantastic mat, and I plan to get another for near the stove as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Feels good to stand on it but if you have backbone problems, you might need a bit harder one
customer_reviews.text: I am loving it, feels soft when you stand over it. But as i have disc herniation problem in my lower back, i can't stand on it for more than an hour or two. Maybe i need more firm mat. But overall a great mat, easy to clean and great to stand with your shoes on. I normally use it without my shoes
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Ahsan UX UI Designer

customer_reviews.title: Great anti-fatigue floor mat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent floor mat - very good for anti fatigue. Very well made and easy to clean. The only thing I notice is despite the anti-slip material on the underside of the mat, it does have a tendency to creep a little as it gets used, so I periodically have to reposition it. Update: After using the mat in our kitchen for about 3 years, the surface finish started to peel off. I contacted Sky Mat and sent a picture of the mat, and they promptly sent a replacement. The replacement seems to be identical to the original, so still very happy with the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Gift giver

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable But Slips Around
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both agree that we like this mat for its purpose, to alleviate back pain while doing the dishes. However, every time you walk away from the mat, it slips under our feet and becomes askew on the floor. We then will try to push it back into place and the non slip feature suddenly works and it is hard to get back into place. I am now looking for some non-slip stickers to put under it so it will no longer move. Has anyone else had this issue??
customer_reviews.author: Danielle LaRue

customer_reviews.title: WOW...this is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My hips feel better already. My husband and I are assessing how many more of these we need. Bathroom for front of mirror, next to his tool table, my bed topper isnt as sweet as this. NO odor. Biggest box sent by UPS even arrived early. IF you are reading this...buy it no regrets here.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay firmly in place
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the mats for about 8 months now. Comfort is good, but the mat does not stay in place on the floor. I have hardwood floors in my living space, including the kitchen, and the mat keeps shifting - left, right and away from cabinet base - and I have to continually push it back into place.
customer_reviews.author: SandyHill

customer_reviews.title: The box is super big for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a great size, perfect for cooking in the kitchen. It makes a noticeable difference when standing for long periods of time. I bought it for my boyfriend and he loves it so much he is going to buy one for his parents.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: I order for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep my husband's legs and hip muscles from cramping while standing in the kitchen. He loves to cook but standing is a problem! This product helps. I love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Cameo

customer_reviews.title: This is a good mat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July 2018 so far holding up great. Use in kitchen. It does move a bit on floor, very comfortable on feet I prefer standing on it without shoes. I have a very bad back so can’t say it really helps with that but I like it. I’m thinking of buying another to put in front of bathroom vanity. Would recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: LLT14

customer_reviews.title: Starting falling apart after a year and Sky Solutions did not respond to email
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat in February of last year and it's already starting to fall apart. It's starting to lose its integrity and it's sinking in much more than usual and the mat is peeling apart. I emailed Sky Solutions and they never responded. So much for customer service and a "lifetime warranty." I use an anti-fatigue mat every day because I have scoliosis and have to use a stand-up desk. I'll take my business elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Rug is in front of our kitchen sink. It is very comfortable. My only small complaint is that it doesn't stay put on the floor. Maybe it needs more grip on the backside? I'm using it on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Brown, Midlothian

customer_reviews.title: Mat is exactly as described, and is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the dark brown mat for next to bed. Have wood floors that are slippery when pushing feet on floor to get into bed. This light as air nonslip mat works perfectly. Highly recommend for any reason to use a mat for!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the mat
customer_reviews.text: Love the mat!!!!!!!! And love the fun message that let me know it shipped! Too funny! Standing on this is like nothing you've experienced before. Oh, and they are NOT paying me to say this. I bought this for my art studio and It is fantastic! I'm ordering one for my daughter's studio because I know that she will love it too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra A Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft on the feet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I finally got my stain glass shop set up. I will be standing for long periods in one place. Its on cement floor and counting on giving me lots of relief on my feet and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it's long enough and wide enough to either stand close to the sink or get a little distance between yourself and the sink. Your not confined to a small area, you can move left to right with plenty of room and comfort. The mat is awesome, I stand at the sink sometimes for an hour doing dishes, and this helps greatly, no more pain in my feet, knees, lower back. I will be buying another mat to go in front of my stove.
customer_reviews.author: Mama6thGrade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS I AM 7WEEKS AFTER MY BACK SURGERY IT FEELS WONDERFUL ON MY FEET AND LEGS
customer_reviews.author: Tommie S Clark

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Color was true to picture online. Well packaged and not bent or creased. Feels like it would be very comfortable. I've tried standing on it for long periods and still have sore feet/knees. Had higher expectations based on the reviews. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nicksmommy27

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I see patients throughout the day and often chart on my computer when I get home. As you can imagine, I send plenty of time sitting as I drive around and when I meet with patients so I try to stand and do my charting when I'm home. I've been using this product for about a week now and just LOVE it! I 'm usually barefoot and the mat provides just enough cushion and sturdiness so that my feet and back never seem to get tired. One of the best purchases I've ever made - many thanks folks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mat! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one during canning season. Great for the feet and back! Great price compared to others. Great color choices. I liked it so much I bought one for my mother for s gift. She loves hers too!
customer_reviews.author: Clulo

customer_reviews.title: This company is really stand behind their product and I'm highly recommended this
customer_reviews.text: I had this mat and used it for 3 years and its surface starting to peel off. I just about to order it again and noticed its life time warranty. I then sent email to request for the replacement at SkySolutionusa.com and after a few emails exchange with Emily I received the replacement after 1 week. This company is really stand behind their product and I'm highly recommended this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just as promised and fulfills the raves
customer_reviews.text: fabulous mat that lies flat on floor... can't imagine how people can work standing without one of these!
customer_reviews.author: tick-freee

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a while in stores and online and they were either much too expensive for what was on offer or cheaply made. This was just what I was looking for!! Good quality and support; eco-friendly and non toxic, and the best part was it was reasonably priced!! I don't like to throw the "P" word around unnecessarily but this mat really is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mats because I have had foot surgery on both my feet and still have problems standing for long periods of time. These met my expectations and more... I bought them because I was cooking Thanksgiving dinner and knew I would be on my feet for long periods. I only wish I would of bought the bigger one to go in front of my sink. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased - It was well packaged, and as other purchasers noted, there was no unpleasant odor. I received the mat in 2 days. The dark brown color goes very well with my new kitchen flooring. It is super comfortable to stand on! No feet imprints are left on the mat, as it immediately bounces back to normal. I'm very happy with it - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: iVal

customer_reviews.title: Good value, mat 'walks' easily
customer_reviews.text: This a very good all purpose mat. Cushioning is great, appearance is very good and it's easily cleaned. My only reason for not giving 5 stars...this mat does not stay in place, it 'walks' about 4"- 6" daily on our tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Anything but Network TV

customer_reviews.title: I loved my first Sky Mat so much
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first Sky Mat so much, I bought a second one. I have them in my kitchen and they are perfect for me. They don't slip on the floor, they stay put. I've also found them easy to wipe up and keep clean. I have plantar fasciitis and standing in one place is quite painful, but these mats make it comfortable enough that I can cook dinner and clean up without excessive pain in my feet and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat to protect my new wood floor in front of the sink. It feels amazing underfoot. I liked it well enough to order a second one for in front of my stove, and a third one for my daughter-in-law for Christmas. Cleans up nicely, the brown color went well with my hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Dday

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my standing varidesk. IT'S WONDERFUL. I have arthritis & I can stand all day. It truly is anti-fatigue. I do take off my heels and use it in my bare feet. It's made well & the beveled edge keeps it from curling on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Jan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Your back will thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to encourage everyone who spends time standing in one spot to purchase the SkyMat. I love to cook but lately my back has begun to hurt. I got the sky mat a few days ago and I have done lots of cooking and dishes. (we had company from out of town and they needed to be fed, right?). I can tell you that I have been extremely pleased with the comfort under my toes and my back is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E Mesick

customer_reviews.title: but still looks nice on our mid-brown floor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two different sizes in maple brown. It is a very dark brown, almost black, but still looks nice on our mid-brown floor. They are really comfortable and really helps reduce foot pain from standing on tile in the kitchen. I bought them after seeing and using them in our friends' kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosvet

customer_reviews.title: ... have neuropathy in my feet and this mat is excellent cushioning. It is far superior to other mats ...
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy in my feet and this mat is excellent cushioning. It is far superior to other mats sold at the big box discount stores. It was shipped in a large flat box so it wasn't folded or rolled. I am going to buy some more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ding Ding

customer_reviews.title: The Mat You're Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Great support (firm) with contoured edges and it has a smooth top so dust doesn't stick which allows for easy cleaning (but a little less traction than others that are rubberized). There is a slight texture with it's "weave" pattern which makes it not boring. Super happy with this mat. My only regret is I didn't buy the longer one!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Graham

customer_reviews.title: It's so comfortable, it'll even make your kids do more kitchen chores
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write an Amazon review for ANYTHING, but Sky Solutions humorous note with my perfectly-shipped mat made me log in and do it. My husband does all the cooking and this mat is absolutely amazing. Even our son takes longer washing dishes when he can stand on this heavenly mat. It truly is the most comfortable thing I've ever stood on and I have tons of foot issues. I wish I had insoles made out of this! It looks stunning and is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: It is light weight so it is easy to move and it has a anti slip design/material ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mat for several weeks now and it work very well for me (e.g. not too soft and not too hard). It is light weight so it is easy to move and it has a anti slip design/material on the bottom so it stays where I put it on my laminate flooring. The top is also anti slip. I highly recommend this and would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Sam

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is soooooooo comfortable. It makes so much of a difference now that I use it by my sink in the kitchen, where I do most of my standing. I would HIGHLY recommend this product for anyone who want to use it in a place where they're doing long periods of standing. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Beneficial
customer_reviews.text: Fits the bill. In addition to relieving back sprain when standing preparing food for long periods of time, it offers protection against peelings, crumbs, liquids falling on the hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: mrmrae

customer_reviews.title: Soft.. SOFT.. SOOFT- all the comfort you need!
customer_reviews.text: Like butter... that's how soft this thing is. I don't know why it took me so long to even purchase it. Doing dishes at the sink suddenly doesn't feel like a chore anymore
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable mat
customer_reviews.text: BEST floor mat. I use it in front of kitchen sink. I have chronic feet pain and always wear shoes in house but take them off to stand on this mat because it is so comfortable. Update: 3 years later... It still looks brand new! It has maintained all cushion and is in perfect condition except where I splattered a little paint on it. I stand on this every day yet NO wear shows. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M Miller

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely luxurious to my feet. I cook a lot and standing at the stove and sink just kill my back. These are so squishy and elegant all at the same time. It really dressed up my kitchen and now that I can spend more time in there which makes me one happy girl!
customer_reviews.author: AMY DUBOSE

customer_reviews.title: Could stand on it all day long!
customer_reviews.text: I have been through half a dozen kitchen mats in the past ranging from 20-40 dollars-they all started off with a lot of cushion and support but a few weeks later, flatten out. This mat is durable, easily cleaned (and hide the stains), and so comfortable. The price is higher but definitely worth it. Could have bought 3 of these in with how much I've spent on mats before!
customer_reviews.author: PaiL

customer_reviews.title: My feet, knees and back are happy
customer_reviews.text: So comfy. I started using a standing desk and realized my feet were not happy campers. I bought this highly rated Sky Mat and am so happy I did. It really takes the strain off my feet, knees and back. My only complaint is the giant box it was shipped in, I felt guilty so much cardboard was used to ship my mat.
customer_reviews.author: by colomtn

customer_reviews.title: Oved this mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat, very soft on my feet. No smell at all. The best part is that it doesn't move around. The other mats I have tried shifted every time you went to stand on them which made them unsafe. Will probably buy another one in the future. The box that it was shipped in was huge though. I am glad that it was shipped flat but the box was tall enough to fit 15 mats in it. Thank goodness it was not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great but stepping on and off makes it move around ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great but stepping on and off makes it move around too easily and I have to keep re-positioning in it. Needs better backing material to keep it in position.
customer_reviews.author: DEG

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my kitchen and takes a lot of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my kitchen and takes a lot of the pressure off of my lower back. When I would do big meals with lots of dishes afterwards, my back would bother me - but not anymore! It's fairly tall, though, so it has taken a little getting used to - I tripped on it once or twice in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Caribbean Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not brown
customer_reviews.text: The brown doesn't look brown. It looks more black. It works just fine, but doesn't match the color.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2014 and thought it was great! However, after less than three years, the top material is all flaked off and the mat is mushed down in the spot where I stand most. It also moves around a lot on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: KimBee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat..... Worth every penny....
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks, we thought of writing a honest review after 4 long hours of standing on the mat. We use it to cook and by the time we finish we will be tired forgetting the food. This mat changed every thing... My wife is completely out of lower ankle pain... Great product...
customer_reviews.author: Sekar M G

customer_reviews.title: Really makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. I have severe neck and back issues, but love to cook, and standing for any length of time really kills my back. I've had this mat for about a week and can really tell a difference. Just bought a second larger mat so that it covers more length between my stove, countertops and sink. Wish the larger one came in Dark Brown, but it apparently doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna M.

customer_reviews.title: Thank You! Thank You! Thank You! My ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank You! Thank You! Thank You! My Knees Are No Longer On Fire With Pain, My Feet Aren’t Aching, And I No Longer Feel Exhausted From Standing On That Little Cute Walmart Mat.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Turner

customer_reviews.title: Cushy and grips the floor well
customer_reviews.text: Love how they feel! Put one by the range and another by the sink. Grips the floor and super safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love the Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Love the mat! Shipped quick. Did have to put it in the garage for a couple of days because of the chemical odor on it but no smell after airing out. I have had multiple back and hip surgeries that has left standing on tile painful. This provides enough cushion that helps me to stand to cook. I was skeptical but glad I made the purchase. In fact I have already purchased a second and probably will buy a third.
customer_reviews.author: Cymbeline

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for standing desk users
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this with my standing desk for several months and love it. It's a must have for standing desk users. The mat is plenty thick, but also very durable and doesn't affect your stability while standing on it. Would gladly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Good product !
customer_reviews.text: Cons: None! Pros: Reasonable price, high quality product, soft yet supportive, dark brown color elegantly blends into our wood flooring, hilarious customer service letters (you’ll see once you order the product).
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on feet and legs
customer_reviews.text: Love the mats. We have in front of sink and stove in kitchen. The only problem I have is it scoots, have to keep pushing back up agInstthe edge.
customer_reviews.author: Maryvb

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen mat!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is so comfy! I walk over to the kitchen sink just to stand on it. Other reviewers said it was hard to clean, and it does have a pattern, but I haven't found it hard to wipe things off of it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: Use this mat.
customer_reviews.text: Only had the mat for a day, but I love it! More than large enough for use with a standing desk, and the company has a sense of humor (you get a hilarious message from the future). (If the mat turns out to have problems later, I'll edit this review)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Monroe

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD! I got one for my mom and became ...
customer_reviews.text: SO GOOD! I got one for my mom and became immediately jealous once I tried it. Whenever I go to her house, I just go in the kitchen and sit on it. I cannot say enough how awesome it is. Is just as described and looks great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Brown

customer_reviews.title: So easy to stand on and clean
customer_reviews.text: So easy to stand on and clean. I love to cook but have trouble standing due to a medical condition. The mat has made it possible for me to revive my passion for cooking. I gave it 4 stars because I ordered and received the mocha one. It is not brown and shown, but black.
customer_reviews.author: cw410

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the feet
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this Sky Mat. I started standing at work and bought this Mat for my feet. It feels great under my feet and my feet and legs do not get fatigued. I have had people in my office stand on the Mat and compliment on how comfy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Fatigue-Reducing Mat
customer_reviews.text: I saw all the excellent reviews online but still had major reservations about ordering the mat. However, I gave in and ordered thinking if it didn't work for me I'd just return it. I have to say that as someone who has plantar fasciitis and sciatica, this has been a god send for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ILCSW-Mats
customer_reviews.text: The mat has a lot of cushion for standing in one place for extended periods of time. I highly recommend the product but I am disappointed that it was 20" in width instead of 24" width as I was using it in conjunction with the 24" x 70" length to form an L shape. I guess I needed to pay closer attention to the width, so busy looking at length to fit the area perfectly that I overlooked one very important fact..
customer_reviews.author: Immanuel

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it. My son-in-law ordered the longer one ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. My son-in-law ordered the longer one but they didn't match. Company responded very quickly and are correcting the problem.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: I love this floor mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this floor mat. I purchased for my kitchen. It looks great, it rarely moves if at all, and it does not have any bad smells.
customer_reviews.author: corine

customer_reviews.title: ... experience with this mat and this company has been great. I don't usually leave reviews - but when ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about our experience with this mat and this company has been great. I don't usually leave reviews - but when our glass coffee pot accidently slipped through my husbands hands and landed on this mat - it actually bounced back up and he caught it. No broken coffee pot - not even a crack. We were so amazed and excited that I said - OK now I have to leave a review. Great product - your feet and all of your unbroken stuff will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relief from back/hip pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! I've been having severe back and hip pain when I sit or stand for any length of time. I took the mat to work was able to work standing at my desk or computer the whole day. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's very comfortable. One of the even nicest things was it ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it much yet hence 4 stars. From what time I have used it, it's very comfortable. One of the even nicest things was it came flat/not rolled which honestly may seem like a small thing but for this mat its a huge benefit
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. I gave the black color one which goes perfectly with my dark cabinets. The mat gives you a lot of cushioning to be able to stand for hours and not have your feet get tired. I've had anti fatigue mats before which cost nearly a $100 but this one seems to be the best I've tried. It's pretty multi purpose too, you can also use it in your office if you have a standing work station or in your work room. Love that.
customer_reviews.author: greedy600

customer_reviews.title: Very thick, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy smooshy (is that a word?). Not to bad to create instability in most, but some with balance issues could have an issue with the thickness. You do get used to how thick it is and I do really enjoy the relief it provides, but it did take a little time to adjust. The quality is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Rlcasper

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and decided to purchase a stand up desk. I needed a mat to stand on since I have hardwood floors. I can stand 8 hours and not have sore legs or feet. Love it. ❤️ I have used it for 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great mat! Great price too, relatively less than brands offered at Bed, Bath & Beyond. The sloped edges make it easy to run the vacuum over the mat. I'd recommend this item if you're in the market for an anti-fatigue mat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Intique

customer_reviews.title: This mat is really quite amazing. It is hard to imagine how good it ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat is really quite amazing. It is hard to imagine how good it feels on your feet until you stand on it. We have only had it a short time and don't know how well it will wear but right now it is incredibly comfortable sitting in front of our stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Choate

customer_reviews.title: Just received one of these and it's great. I have pretty bad planter fasciitis right now ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received one of these and it's great. I have pretty bad planter fasciitis right now and without this mat I couldn't even handle standing in my kitchen and cooking. I got the brown one and it's just like the color in the picture, very nice chocolate brown. Highly recommended. Also, very humorous emails sent by the company to thank me for purchasing. I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Tulver

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing at work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Varidesk and it works great. It helps relieve the pressure on your feet, especially while getting used to standing and working. I can't imagine standing all day without one!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Contoured edges means no one trips on it and it's super cushy. My husband said I should have gotten a gigantic one that covered the whole kitchen cook area! I also enjoyed the funny email I got from the seller who was determined to make sure I was happy with my purchase. I laughed out loud at the lengths they were willing to go through to make me happy. Offering his first born and such....
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable improvement at a standing desk
customer_reviews.text: I use a standing desk; it is a noticeable difference between standing on this mat and standing on a carpeted floor. It's not QUITE the "Holy Cow!" difference I had anticipated, but when I stop off it, I'm quickly reminded how nice it is. If the price is right, this is a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this one is by far the best! After 10 to 12 hours of standing
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars is not enough, I think this is a 10 star mat! In our medical practice, there is alot of us that are now using stand up desks and I have had to order quite a few of anti fatigue mats, but this one is by far the best! After 10 to 12 hours of standing, my feet, knees and back are all in a great place. Keep up the good quality Sky Mat team, you are making the world a much more cushiony place to be!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Butler

customer_reviews.title: Only disappointment was the color
customer_reviews.text: Only disappointment was the color. It was suppose to be dark brown (and is) but it looks black, the dark brown and black I am sure in real item cannot be told apart. The material is great and rug in itself is very good, just be careful when you look at the representative colors on line, the dark brown anyway is much darker in real.
customer_reviews.author: Moe USA

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Sky mat
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Sky mat. It is very comfortable and feels good when you stand on it. My only suggestion is that they would make it a little longer. It would be nice if it was 4 feet so it would go under the dishwasher too. My last mat was popular but after time turned up on the edges and you would trip on it. This one will not do that.
customer_reviews.author: Anne  C

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE to cook and entertain
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE to cook and entertain. These mats.. these mats here are awesome!!! usually, my feet hurt from a day of cooking and entertaining, but not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amos & Netta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our church kitchen, where we stood for 6-hour cooking shifts at the stoves during our peanut-brittle-making campaign...what welcome relief for our tired feet. A bit expensive, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Luvs 2 Read

customer_reviews.title: Lovely mat, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Quite lovely mat they have here. I had a lower quality mat before this and it was a big step up. I have an adjustable desk at work, and a month in, I'm standing about 4 hours a day without discomfort. It's plenty big and leans nicely (doesn't flop over and get in the way) when I'm sitting.
customer_reviews.author: TinyHamster

customer_reviews.title: Best mat ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new kitchen mat. So plush and durable. Have had several other brands and they do not even come close to how great this one is. Plan on ordering another one to go in front of the stove area.
customer_reviews.author: Jean F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the mat at my standup workstation for a few weeks now and since I work 10 hours days, it's essential. I stood for 9 hours yesterday and today without even noticing.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: These mats are very comfortable and feel great for my legs and back
customer_reviews.text: These mats are very comfortable and feel great for my legs and back. Color was true to picture. I got the dark brown and it’s just the colored I wanted. I though they would be heavier. They move around a lot. I would have liked if the stayed in place more. Overall, I’m happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well-made
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, well-made, and the edges stay flat. Who could ask for more? If you're using a stand-up desk, the mat simply must be top quality, or your body will suffer. Thanks to this mat, I will be the last man standing. Now if only there was a model with a massage option!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product to anyone that does a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the mat for about a week but it is really making a difference. I have a standing work desk and the mat has just the right amount of cushioning to help me keep standing through out the day with our having to the sit down breaks. I highly recommend this product to anyone that does a lot of standing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's definitely squishy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first standing mat. There appear to be a number of quality mats out there, but not many that ship to Australia. So that was a big advantage for the Sky Mat. I had no real expectations for this mat, other than it had to be comfy for my feet, be big enough to stretch my legs should I want to and not slip on a tiled floor. So... yes, I did have expectations after all. And this mat meets them all entirely. The squishiness is an enjoyable bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love the mat but I ordered brown and I received black. Too much trouble to send back so I will have to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Looram

customer_reviews.title: They look great, but it's hard on my legs when I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: We just renovated our kitchen and chose tile floors. The tiles look great, but it's hard on my legs when I'm doing dishes or cooking for long periods of time. I ordered one to test out and quickly ordered another. Awesome product and a great price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: vtreader

customer_reviews.title: It is great! My husband has a standing desk and his ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great! My husband has a standing desk and his feet were killing him at the end of the day. This mat was the perfect solution. I am hoping it lasts a long time, it was a bit expensive. I will complain that Amazon packed it in an enormous box...such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: ecs

customer_reviews.title: Her only complaint is that she can't take it with her to her job because she finds it extremely comfortable. She drags it from o
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for my daughter who is a commercial and personal chef. Her only complaint is that she can't take it with her to her job because she finds it extremely comfortable. She drags it from one side of her kitchen to the other just she doesn't have to stand in one spot without the cushion!
customer_reviews.author: CelticGrace

product_meta.title: Sky Mat, Comfort Anti Fatigue Mat, Perfect for Kitchens and Standing Desks, 20 x 39 x 3/4" (Brown) (5 Colors, 3 sizes)
feature_bullets: #COMFORTABLE: Our Sky Core Foam is the perfect blend of support and softness for standing all day in the kitchen or office.
#SAFE: Advanced beveled edge and super non-slip bottom to prevent tripping.
#ECO-FRIENDLY: Highest quality materials with NO toxic off-gassing smell.
#DURABILITY: Our Anti Fatigue Mat will stand the test of time and you have a Lifetime replacement promise if it doesn't.
#STYLE: Modern look that easily wipes clean and will not collect dirt or pet hair.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,349 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
